messages.title: A strong voice for North Norfolk
messages.content: To work for a strong economy supporting businesses, reducing and reforming business rates and cutting red tape to encourage employment and success.

messages.title: A strong local economy
messages.content: North Norfolk's economy relies on the coast for a thriving tourism industry. To date tourism earnings in the area total some £400m.

messages.title: Don't let your local vote put Ed Miliband into No. 10
messages.content: This year's General Election is the most important in a generation. The world we live in is a dangerous one and Britain needs a strong and secure government...

messages.title: Nick Clegg hints at possible coalition deal with Labour in 2015
messages.content: The long-standing tactical voting by our constituents to keep Labour out is as important ever.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working for a strong economy by supporting businesses, reducing business rates and cutting red tape.
Creating more apprenticeships with better education, skills and careers advice.
Fighting for funding for coastal management, road and rail infrastructure, and campaigning for broadband and mobile phone coverage.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The long-standing tactical voting by our constituents to keep Labour out is as important ever.

issues.economy: To work for a strong economy supporting businesses, reducing and reforming business rates and cutting red tape to encourage employment and success.
issues.education: Creating more apprenticeships with better education, skills and careers advice.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am passionate about getting the funding we deserve back into North Norfolk.
